topic.title: Exclude Certain DITA Topics from WebHelp Search Results

keywords.indexterm: WebHelp Responsive systemExclude DITA topics from search results
WebHelp Classic systemExclude DITA topics from search results

body.p: There are several ways to exclude certain DITA resources from your WebHelp system's search results. This is useful if you have topics in your DITA map structure that you do not want to be included in search results for your WebHelp system. The first method involves setting a parameter in the WebHelp transformation scenario and the second involves setting an attribute in each DITA topic.

section.title: Transformation Parameter Method
section.p:
To exclude DITA topics from WebHelp search results using a transformation parameter, follow these steps:
Set the webhelp.search.custom.excludes.file parameter to the paths of files you want to exclude from the search results.
Run the transformation scenario.

section.title: Search Attribute Method
section.p: The WebHelp Search engine does not index DITA topics that have the @search attribute set to no.

To exclude DITA topics from WebHelp search results using this attribute, follow these steps:
Edit the DITA map and for any topicref that you want to exclude from search results, set the search attribute to no. For example:<topicref href="../topics/internal-topic1.dita" search="no"/>
Save your changes to the DITA map.
Run your WebHelp system transformation scenario.
